name: Discopia
description:
Welcome to Discopia!

Your goal is to help revive the MIDIan race by bringing the disco back to them. Solve mind-bending puzzles, while creating disco tunes :)

"Hope. You are our last hope!

A plague of silence took over the land and banished all music, causing the MIDIans to lay dormant.

You must restore the land of MIDI to it's former glory, through the power of disco!

Navigate the lands using your funky drum beats, dodging and defeating enemies along the treacherous path ahead.

You must revive your fellow MIDIans, inspiring them with the power of disco, and together you will make the land of MIDI groove again!"
